pages.text: The Ghost Train Strain$(br2)Base THC: 19% $(br)Base CBD: 6% $(br)Effect: Shy
Ghost Train Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Ghost Train Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Ghost Train Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Ghost Train Weed in an Extractor
You can package your ghost train weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
